api_key.title: Rachio API Key
api_key.description: See https://rachio.readme.io/docs/authentication to obtain your Rachio API key.

external_webhook_address.title: External Webhook Address
external_webhook_address.description: External IP and port to receive webhook requests. Forward these to your internal webhook port. Only necessary if you wish to update Homekit in real time when a Rachio schedule is executing.

internal_webhook_port.title: Internal Webhook Port
internal_webhook_port.description: Internal port for receiving webhook requests.

clear_previous_webhooks.title: Clear Previous Webhooks
clear_previous_webhooks.description: Clear any previous webhooks before establishing a new one.
